screening_questions.question_text: Do you have experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)?
What are your compensation expectations for this role?
Describe a challenging project you led and how you overcame obstacles.

job_description_text: We are seeking a Senior Python Developer with 5+ years of experience in building scalable web applications. Must have expertise in Django, PostgreSQL, and AWS. The ideal candidate will have led teams and delivered complex projects. Salary range: $140K-$180K. Must be authorized to work in the United States.

candidate_resume_data.summary: Software engineer with 4 years of experience building web applications using Python, Django, and modern cloud technologies.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Built scalable web applications using Python and Django serving 100K+ users
Designed and implemented PostgreSQL database schemas
Deployed applications to AWS using EC2, S3, and RDS

experience.title: Junior Developer
bullets: Developed features for Python-based web applications
Collaborated with team on code reviews and testing
